title: materials
body: after a match it says that im ineligible to get materials. how do i go by and fix that?

replies.body:
If you were under a recent behavioral suspension, it could be affecting your eligibility to earn Hextech loot. When one of these suspension happens, it takes a trend of good behavior to earn back eligibility. 

If you have any questions about a specific suspension and how it may be affecting your eligibility, you'll want to reach out to our support team in a [support ticket.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
